prompt: Design a dark-themed QR code scanner page with a deep navy background. Include a rectangular viewfinder with a thin white border and sharp corners, centered horizontally but positioned towards the bottom. Display the title 'QR Scanner' at the top in a bold, silver font. Above the viewfinder, add instructional text 'Align the QR code' in a light gray font. Place a flashlight toggle button at the top-right with a silver icon and 'Flash' label, using silver as the accent color. Include a gallery button at the top-left with a silver icon. Use a sleek, modern design with minimal padding and sharp contrasts.
